column1: }}'''Ar-Sakalthôr''' was the 22nd [[King of Númenor]].  As had now become the custom in [[Númenor]], he took his royal title in the [[Adûnaic]] tongue.  Had Ar-Sakalthôr taken his title in [[Quenya]], it would have been [[Tar-Falassion]], "Son of the Coast".  Ar-Sakalthôr ruled [[Númenor]] for sixty-nine years.<ref>{{UT
